pr_title: [netatmo] Make safe the execution of the refresh token job

timeline.message:
[netatmo] Make safe the execution of the refresh token job

Fix #4270

Signed-off-by: Laurent Garnier <lg.hc@free.fr>

timeline.bodyHTML:
Try to minimize the scope of the catch to just the runtime exceptions since any checked exceptions added in the future changes might unintentionally get handled the same.

Suggested change
} catch (Exception e) {
} catch (RuntimeException e) {
timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText: After reading about RuntimeException vs Exception, I agree with you.
replies.author: lolodomo

timeline.message:
